short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Collection of cool and stylish (▰˘◡˘▰) kawaii and text faces for your Instagram, facebook, twitter bio, profile name or comments.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
On this Kawaii Faces and Text Faces extension, you will get a huge collection of text faces, which you can use in your daily communication on social media platforms or send a text message. With these text faces, you can present your mood and make your chat unique and cool.

Here are some examples of Kawaii text faces
(✿◠‿◠) (ﾉ◕ヮ◕)ﾉ*:･ﾟ✧ ＼（＾○＾）人（＾○＾）／ (づ｡◕‿‿◕｡)づ
